mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.DEP_NAME, C.POS_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEP_NO = B.DEP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN JOB_POSITION C ON A.POS_NO = C.POS_NO WHERE A.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO EMPLOYEE(EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, EMP_ID, EMP_PWD, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_PHONE, CATEGORY, STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_EMP.NEXTVAL, #{empName}, #{empId}, #{empPwd}, #{empEmail}, #{empPhone}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT) INTO PERSONNEL_CHART(EMP_NO, HIRE_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_EMP.CURRVAL, SYSDATE) SELECT * FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WORKINGDAY (WORK_NO, EMP_NO, TODAY, START_TIME, STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_WORK.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, SYSDATE, #{startTime}, 'Y')
mapper.update: UPDATE WORKINGDAY SET THIS_WEEK = CEIL((TO_DATE(TODAY,'YY/MM/DD') - TRUNC(TRUNC(TO_DATE(TODAY,'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'IW') + 1) / 7) WHERE TODAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')

UPDATE WORKINGDAY SET STATUS = 'L' WHERE START_TIME > TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('08:01:00', 'HH24:MI:SS'),'HH24:MI:SS') AND TODAY NOT IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(C.LEAVE_START, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM APPROVAL B JOIN APP_LEAVE C ON B.APP_NO = C.APP_NO WHERE APP_WRITER_NO = #{empNo})
UPDATE WORKINGDAY SET FINISH_TIME = #{finishTime} WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TODAY, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일 ("DY")"') = #{today} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}

UPDATE WORKINGDAY SET WORK_HOUR = SUBSTR(TO_TIMESTAMP(#{finishTime},'HH24:MI:SS') - TO_TIMESTAMP(START_TIME,'HH24:MI:SS'), 12, 8) WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TODAY, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일 ("DY")"') = #{today} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.EMP_NO, A.EMP_NAME, A.EMP_ID, NVL(B.POS_NAME,'연수생') POS_NAME, NVL(C.DEP_NAME,'연수중') DEP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT JOIN JOB_POSITION B ON A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEP_NO = C.DEP_NO WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.EMP_ID != 'admin' ORDER BY B.POS_NO

SELECT A.EMP_NO, A.EMP_NAME, A.EMP_ID, A.EMP_PHONE, A.EMP_LOC, A.EMP_PFE, A.EMP_ONOFF, NVL(B.POS_NAME,'연수생') POS_NAME, NVL(C.DEP_NAME,'연수중') DEP_NAME, D.START_TIME, D.END_TIME, D.REZ_TITLE FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT JOIN JOB_POSITION B ON A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEP_NO = C.DEP_NO LEFT JOIN RESERVATION D ON A.EMP_NO = D.REZ_WRITER WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT A.EMP_NO, A.EMP_NAME, A.EMP_ID, NVL(B.POS_NAME,'연수생') POS_NAME, NVL(C.DEP_NAME,'연수중') DEP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT JOIN JOB_POSITION B ON A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEP_NO = C.DEP_NO WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{empName}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, NULL, 1, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE CATEGORY = 1 AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TIMEOFFCONTENT A SET (A.TIMEOFF_TYPE, A.TIMEOFF_CONTENT, A.USE_NUM) = (SELECT B.LEAVE_CATEGORY, B.LEAVE_REASON, B.LEAVE_TOTALDATE FROM APP_LEAVE B WHERE A.APP_NO = B.APP_NO) , (A.TOTAL_NUM) = (SELECT C.REMAIN_NUM FROM TIMEOFF C WHERE ROWNUM=1) WHERE A.APP_STATUS = 'C' AND (A.TODAY, A.EMP_NO, A.APP_NO) = (SELECT B.APP_CREATE_DATE, B.APP_WRITER_NO, B.APP_NO FROM APPROVAL B WHERE A.APP_NO = B.APP_NO) AND TOTAL_NUM IS NULL
UPDATE TIMEOFFCONTENT A SET REMAIN_NUM = TOTAL_NUM - USE_NUM WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND APP_STATUS = 'C' AND A.APP_NO = (SELECT B.APP_NO FROM APP_LEAVE B WHERE A.APP_NO = B.APP_NO)

UPDATE TIMEOFF SET USE_NUM = (SELECT SUM(USE_NUM) FROM TIMEOFFCONTENT), REMAIN_NUM = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT REMAIN_NUM FROM TIMEOFFCONTENT ORDER BY REMAIN_NUM)WHERE ROWNUM=1) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND REMAIN_NUM = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT TOTAL_NUM FROM TIMEOFFCONTENT ORDER BY TOTAL_NUM)WHERE ROWNUM=1)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TIMEOFFCONTENT WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY TIMEOFFCONTENT_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TIMEOFFCONTENT WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
